Gatherer:AlchemyBag.NAME: Alchemy Bag
Gatherer:AlchemyBag.FLAVOR: A mysterious bag with the power of recurring potions.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a lesser potion to your Sack.

Gatherer:MiracleBag.NAME: Miracle Bag
DESCRIPTIONS: Not replaced #yAlchemy #yBag. At the start of each combat, obtain a random potion (to your regular potion slot).
Replaces #yAlchemy #yBag. At the start of each combat, obtain a rare potion (to your regular potion slot).

Gatherer:IronSlate.NAME: Iron Slate
Gatherer:IronSlate.FLAVOR: A map to follow the Ironclad's path.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, #b2 of your Strikes change color to red and gain #b2 damage.

Gatherer:SilentSlate.NAME: Silent Slate
Gatherer:SilentSlate.FLAVOR: A map to follow the Silent's path.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, #b2 of your Defends change color to green and gain #b2 #yBlock.

Gatherer:FloralEgg.NAME: Floral Egg
Gatherer:FloralEgg.FLAVOR: Eggs like flowers. Or they are eggs like flowers
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, upgrade ALL your #yFlower cards.

Gatherer:Leftovers.NAME: Leftovers
Gatherer:Leftovers.FLAVOR: No one can fully understand how potion can be made with leftover liquid.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a Potion, gain a #yLesser_Potion to your Sack with 20% chance.

Gatherer:FlyingFruit.NAME: Flying Fruit
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yExhaust #b1/3/6/10 #yUnique cards after pick up, raise your Max HP by #b

Gatherer:ExplorersTrail.NAME: Explorer's Trail
Gatherer:ExplorersTrail.FLAVOR: Sometimes explorers follow a clearly wrong path.
DESCRIPTIONS: Card reward screen now shows the pick ratio from previous patch. NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn if you choose lowest-picked card from the previous card reward.
